locations.title: TA Express Travel Center
locations.content: TA Express Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA travel station has it all. We were able to use the RV dump station for $5, get a nice hot shower in a good clean facility for $17, do our laundry in clean laundry machines for a total of $8 (plus we had to buy the laundry soap, ‚Ä¶

The fuel pumps don‚Äôt work so you have to go inside. They don‚Äôt give you the rewards points/shower credits that you earn. The towels are nasty‚Ä¶.. you‚Äôre better off going anywhere else if possible.

This was a great all-in-one stop. nice private unlimited showers. Locking room with toilet and sink as well. Had good hot water. They provided 2 towels, 2 wash clothes, and 1 hand towel. Even a bar of soap. Shower for $15.95. I did 2 loads ‚Ä¶

Very complete store.
You can take a shower and do your laundry.
Very clean.

locations.content: Corner Pantry Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Attention, truckers!!! First of all, it's not a regular "Flying J Travel Plaza". They do not accept truck driver's rewards points for the shower. Even if you get  the 50 gallons of diesel, you can't get a free shower. Second, I washed my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ you are a O.T.R. Truck Driver, you will like this place. Easy in and out refueling, lot's of parking, clean shower room's and latrines. Let's not forget a fantastic dinner, and a bar/casino that is top notch. The casino is just video ‚Ä¶
No longer a flying j... 12.06 for a shower, might as well stay in Rapid or Hot Springs.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Thank you Jonathon for opening up the shower so I could bath my puppy dog! Also man great job in there, no dust on fan floors clean toilet shining..they should promote u buddy! Left a 5 bill at desk for uüöõ you are awesome sir ‚Ä¶

Truck driver here. Stopped here to shower and get lunch. The following day I came down with the Norovirus which was so intense it sent me to the hospital that night. My doctor theorized that because I used the public showers here at this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ City because of the reputation for water in fuel at the Flying J location on the East side of the city but no problems here. There was even parking at 0515 on a Sunday and a clean shower and nice staff.  The tall blonde lady was cheery :-) ‚Ä¶

My husband ran an ultra marathon of 107 miles in the black hills. After the race, we needed showers and our campsite did not have them. We googled it and Pilot Travel Center showed up and we gave it a shot. I am so beyond pleased with our ‚Ä¶
Setting for shower hours where no damn cleaning person to do the job

Shower is super clean‚Ä¶. This comment is specifically for staff .. guys you are so polite‚Ä¶ specially at subway lady super friendly‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt even hesitate to put anything I ask extra topic ‚Ä¶ wow thank you so much..

We came all the way from the eastern panhandle of WV. Had been on the road, no sleep except for 2 or 3 hours, and no shower for 2 and a half days!! Shayla was sweet. I work at the Pilot in ClearBrook,VA and felt an instant connection with ‚Ä¶
$18.05 for a shower ... There's not much on food üòï... but nice little quiet parking area ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in for diesel with a 40 ft 5th wheel. Was easy in and out. Also took a quick shower at $12 was a bit pricey. I think $12 is too much but it was very clean, extremely hot, and spacious. In addition to the normal convenience items the had the ‚Ä¶

Couple of months ago, I was in a hurry and needed a shower and to change clothes. Brett the assistant manager helped me get in and out quickly. He was incredibly helpful and pleasant. The showers were very clean and nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a decent Love‚Äôs clean parking lot, clean store, restrooms and showers. The only issue I had is when I went in to shower this morning at like 4 o‚Äôclock you have an employee. I did not catch his name, but he‚Äôs a rather large man and ‚Ä¶

I wanted to make a request to change how this loves is set up so truckers don't have to walk a quarter mile to shower and eat. Can we instead make the people who don't work as much as us, or drive vehicles as big as us walk instead. Check ‚Ä¶
Clean shower lots of parking and they have the washers and dryers that uses the MLR card so no need for coins.

Absolutely amazing experience in terms of long distance travelling through America. Shower facilities were clean and amazing to use after a long hike in the Black Hills. Staff was very friendly and helpful in every way. Can't thank you guys ‚Ä¶

Very long wait for shower i already waiting last 40 minutes tgat time only i am the person waiting i saw 4-5 Coustmer leave shower and 3-4 employees just walk here but nobody clean shower now 7 shower waiting they have total 7 shower but ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , and it's what it needs to be - a very restful and convenient place. The shower is first rate, the sites are spotless concrete pads, back-in, with FHU. Cellular service is fast - both Verizon and T-Mobile. Shopping is nearby,, road ‚Ä¶

Good place for fuel, shower and sleep BUT grain to coup coffee machine n√©es a maintenance : 6 minutes to brew an awful taste coffee doesn't worth the wait and the price. Filter coffee machines were both empty : housse and columbian.

This location is understaffed.  The bathrooms were atrocious upon arrival and things weren't cleaned even an hour later. Also, truck side employees don't show till 7:00a so good luck getting a shower till then.

‚Ä¶ that's what keeps me coming back, no matter where in America I am.  Thank u so much for everything u do, thank u for always having a clean store, bathroom, AND shower.  And even tho I'm always incognito üòÇüòÇ y'all still greet me with a smile ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a couple of hours, took a shower. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ option for parking. Im sure glad I did because it will be my first option going forward. Parking wasn't a problem the bathrooms and showers are clean. I usually use shower power at loves or pilot so they are usually free but the price for ‚Ä¶

My wife and I just showered here. We got some drinks and got ready to hit the road, and the cashier told us "hey just so you know, next time you shower here, I will charge you for 2 SEPARATE SHOWERS‚Äù
Ok good. I won‚Äôt be back üòé ‚Ä¶
Good place to park the truck for the night.  Bought a shower and was given two feet towels to dry off with.  Thank God I bring quick dry towels with me. ‚Ä¶

Store itself clean outside clean. But if you drive over the road or just need a shower it's 8.52 even after buying 980.00 worth of diesel. No AC no fan upstairs. Shower room is hot. Bad enough I brushed my teeth put on Deodorant and even ‚Ä¶
$8 spotless shower.Thank u
Stopped for a shower, very clean and reasonably priced. Restroom was also very clean. Friendly employees. So glad we found this Travel stop.

‚Ä¶ Not too polite, but the young girl with red hair was polite, friendly and others were good too. Bathrooms and all areas were clean. The upstairs dedicated for trackers looks good and clean - shower rooms, bathrooms, washer&dryer, tables. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ morning of working on the semi. Cold, wet and disgusting. Grabbed a shower and headed over to the restaurant for what I hoped was a good burger and fries. Shower and lounge area was very musty and outdated. Came in to the restaurant at 12: ‚Ä¶

Good place be nice if its was bigger. But showers you have to be a very small man or woman to shower in there. No toilet so use it before you shower. The  lady on inside was very nice and helpful. But could stand a good clean on the inside ‚Ä¶

Around 30 truck parking spots (if drivers would learn how to park and care for others too). Awesome country side place to stop at if you need a break, delicious restaurant food, $5.38 shower, nice driver lounge, laundry, etc.
Really nice people and you cant beat and $8 shower.
Good food helpful workers clean shower's they are a little small but clean

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ so low. We pulled in after 9pm (30-foot RV) and there was ample parking that wasn't next to truck so we were well out of their way. The shower ($7) was clean, warm with good pressure. The coffee was great in the morning. Would totally stop ‚Ä¶

Western Travel Terminal is a great place to fill up on fuel, on snacks, coffee, to grab a bite to eat, get a clean shower, or drink suds & cocktails. The waitstaff is really friendly & the food tasty. You'd be hard put to find a better ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: What used to be $5 for a shower is now $15. Please explain why your price went up 200% in a month. Kind of a ripoff is you ask me.
Decent little place to stop for truckers 1 shower, plenty of drink options, decent food and nice ppl.
No shower's, 6pm no hot food , a glorified convenience store with diesel and parking....just sad not a real truck stop. PS friendly staff.
Very clean shower.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I‚Äôve ever been to. There‚Äôs soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

showerReviews.reviewText: Friendly people inside and shower was ok. Big lot for parking. Was here on a Sunday and told they were not cooking any burgers or anything else and told about their cold options instead

locations.title: Circle K | Truck Stop
locations.content: Circle K | Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Don't come here to get a fountain pop for the road. Worst quality cups for fountain pop I have ever experienced. The lids just rest on top/don't close. Loved spending 15 minutes on the side of the road cleaning up my car from the spill. Get different cups, please.

Friendly staff, clean restrooms, showers and quick check out. They also have an ATM, laundry room and mini Casino inside. Lots of truck parking and a 24-hour restaurant connected to you the Travel Center. There are tables and seating inside the casino and a counter section that you can sit at as well.
Great place for gas way cheaper than Washington clean and well kept. If you're missing something on your trip they should have what you need including power cords and batteries

Stopped in due to severe storm. Had a bit to eat in the Restaurant, Marlin's. Decent menu and food! Gals were all helpful and polite! Fuel and Gas islands, showers, game room, laundry and well stocked C-Store. Theres also a small CASINO inside. Restrooms were very clean and stocked..recommend this pit stop to anyone passing thru!

A conveniently located convenience store next to a restaurant and associated with a fuel station that had reasonably priced fuel.  The bathrooms were clean and had a lot of stalls.  There was a wide variety of beverages (alcohol and non alcoholic)  tons of snack options including doughnuts. There was also abundant souvenirs.

This place is disgusting since Circle K took over from Holiday.
The floor is dirty and the men's room is just plain nasty. It about makes you puke it stinks so bad. It used to be a nice clean stop.
I don't typically stop at these places but, needed to for a restrooms break, was pretty clean & stocked
